text: Ron Mercer (born May 18, 1976) is a former NBA basketball player for the Boston Celtics. He wore number 5 jersey for most of his career. He went to school at the University of Kentucky. He was born in Nashville, Tennessee. == Other websites == *Ron Mercer at Basketball-Reference Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Sportspeople from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Ron Mercer
